channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Ping Optimizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Ping Optimizer

item.title: CVE-2022-1591|2024-08-03T00:10:03.505Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20ping%20optimizer
item.description: The WordPress Ping Optimizer WordPress plugin before 2.35.1.3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2023-6385|2024-08-02T08:28:21.786Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20ping%20optimizer
item.description: The WordPress Ping Optimizer WordPress plugin through 2.35.1.3.0 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks such as clearing logs.

item.title: CVE-2023-6385|2024-04-10T05:00:02.214Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20ping%20optimizer
item.description: The WordPress Ping Optimizer WordPress plugin through 2.35.1.3.0 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks such as clearing logs.
